name: Jewelry Bonney
text: [On Play] Up to one of your opponent's rested characters will not become active during your opponent's next refresh phase. Then, at the end of your turn, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.

effect.text: Up to one of your opponent's rested characters will not become active during your opponent's next refresh phase. Then, at the end of your turn, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.
